climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: Double Duty - Twin USB-A ports pump out a combined 24W—enough to provide a full-speed charge to 2 phones at once. (Not compatible with Qualcomm Quick Charge.)
Ultra-Compact - The car charger’s super-small design conserves space, allowing seamless access to the rest of your dashboard.
Heavy Metal - Finished with a scratch-resistant aluminum alloy surface to match even the most pristine vehicle interiors.
Premium Components - Gold-plated circuitry reduces heat while charging to maximize charging speed and efficiency.
What You Get - PowerDrive 2 Alloy car charger, welcome guide, our worry-free 18-month warranty, and friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Note - This charger does not support Qualcomm Quick Charge. Your phone's screen will not show a fast charging notification when charging. - This is a USB-A charger. It will only work with USB-A cables such as USB-A to Lightning cables and USB-A to USB-C cables.

Superior Safety Anker’s exclusive MultiProtect safety system provides complete protection for you and your devices. Flush Fit Built to take up as little space as possible; keeping everything else in reach. Easy Installation The ridged end allows instant, struggle-free plugging and unplugging.

Heavy Metal The first PowerDrive charger to feature a tough and sleek aluminum alloy exterior. Ultra-Compact No wider than a quarter, this charger takes up only as much space as it needs to charge 2 devices at once, and not a millimeter more. The Anker Advantage High-Speed Charging. Advanced technology. Join our family of over 50 million happy users, and change the way you charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anker 320 Car Charger – A Compact Powerhouse for Your On-the-Go Charging Needs!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Anker 320 Car Charger, and it has exceeded all my expectations. The sleek design, coupled with the powerful performance, makes it a must-have for anyone who spends a significant amount of time on the road.The dual USB-A ports provide a combined 24W, ensuring a lightning-fast charge for two devices simultaneously. This feature is a game-changer for road trips or daily commutes when my phone and tablet need a quick power boost. The compact design is a real space-saver, seamlessly fitting into my car's dashboard without obstructing other controls. The scratch-resistant aluminum alloy surface not only adds a touch of elegance but also ensures durability, making it stand out in terms of both form and function.What truly sets the Anker 320 apart is its premium components, featuring gold-plated circuitry that efficiently reduces heat during charging. This not only maximizes the charging speed but also ensures the safety of my devices. I appreciate the attention to detail that Anker has put into this product. With the added bonus of an 18-month warranty and excellent customer service, the Anker 320 Car Charger is undoubtedly a smart investment for anyone in need of a reliable on-the-go charging solution. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly compact charger
reviews.reviewText: Charger has a very small profile, but is easy to install or remove from the auto power port. The quality of materials appears to be excellent, and durable. It emits a very soft blue light to locate in a darkened interior. So far, it's worked perfectly for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and works well
reviews.reviewText: I'm writing this review after several years of use and can say that the charger has performed well. Even after summers of being locked in my hot car, it still works well. This charger seems to be well made and durable. I do like the little blue LED that signals that its working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact and works just like you want it to
reviews.reviewText: This little charger works just like you'd want it to. It will by no means charge your phone super fast, but its out of the way and charges at a reasonable rate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anker is impressing me as of late
reviews.reviewText: I’ve purchased a few Anker products over the years and have slowly grown to really appreciate their value and quality. We have some vehicles that needed some phone chargers to plug into the cigarette lighter and these chargers fit the bill. What I really liked about them was not only the affordable price but the fact that they are extremely low profile and don’t protrude from the dash of the vehicle and the fact that they also feel like a quality product. They have a little bit of heft to them so they don’t feel cheap, but they’re not so heavy that they feel like it’s too much. I’ve shared this link with a few friends and family that I’ve purchased them and they all spoke highly of them. Whenever I look for electronic devices, chargers, cables, etc. I find myself always looking to see what Anker has to compare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son’s car and it works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charger is extremely small
reviews.reviewText: I liked the convenience and quick charging capabilities

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Good product, well made, quality. I’d recommend as a quality buy

El cargador es pequeño así que es muy discreto, no es carga rápida pero cumple su función. Tuve que comprar un cable adicional para poder cargar mi IPhone. Se pueden cargar 2 celulares al mismo tiempo
Works perfectly in my car and charges very well

The Anker 320 Car Charger is a fantastic piece of technology that I would highly recommend to anyone in need of a reliable and high-quality car charger.First and foremost, the design of the charger is truly stunning. The slim and compact size of the charger makes it easy to store in your car without taking up too much space, and the sleek design will blend in seamlessly with the interior of any vehicle. The use of high-quality materials ensures that the charger is both durable and long-lasting, meaning that you can rely on it for years to come.But it's not just the design of the Anker 320 Car Charger that is impressive - its performance is also exceptional. The charger is capable of delivering a powerful and efficient charge to your devices, ensuring that they are always ready to go when you need them. Whether you're charging a smartphone, tablet, or other USB-enabled device, the Anker 320 Car Charger delivers reliable and fast charging every time.Overall, I would highly recommend the Anker 320 Car Charger to anyone in need of a high-quality and reliable car charger. Its sleek design, high-quality materials, and exceptional performance make it a top choice for anyone looking to keep their devices charged on the go.

Pro:Dimensioni compatte e portatili: Il caricabatteria è piccolo e leggero, il che lo rende facile da trasportare e riporre.Ricarica rapida: Il caricabatteria supporta la ricarica rapida per due dispositivi contemporaneamente.Porte USB doppie: Le due porte USB consentono di caricare due dispositivi contemporaneamente.Compatibilità universale: Il caricabatteria è compatibile con la maggior parte dei dispositivi USB.Sicurezza: Il caricabatteria è dotato di protezioni integrate contro sovraccarichi, sovratensioni e cortocircuiti.Contro:Il cavo non è incluso: Il caricabatteria non include un cavo USB, quindi è necessario acquistarlo separatamente.Su una delle mie due auto ha problemi di contatto (cosa che non succedec on altri carica batterie)Considerazioni sul prodotto:Il caricabatteria auto mini Anker PowerDrive è un'ottima scelta per chi cerca un caricabatteria compatto, portatile e potente. Il caricabatteria è in grado di caricare due dispositivi contemporaneamente ed è compatibile con la maggior parte dei dispositivi USB.Conclusione:Il caricabatteria auto mini Anker PowerDrive è un prodotto di alta qualità che offre un'ottima combinazione di dimensioni, prestazioni e prezzo. Uso da sempre prodotti Anker e la loro affidabilità è eccezzionale

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have tried a few car chargers over the years and this anker product is superior, it is small and sleek and provides good quality charging easily. The product is small and sleek, well designed with a metallic design alongside Anker branding. The car charger has two USB ports which both provide equal power charge to my phone. This product is great and I have had no issues with it. Charges my phone perfectly.I find anker to be a great company with great customer service also which is further part of the reason I will be providing this product with a 5 star review.
